verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my desire to honor you
Lord with all my heart
I worship you
All i have within me
I give you praise
All that i adore
Is in you

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Lord i give you my heart
I give you my soul
I live for you alone
Every breath that i take
Every moment I'm awake
Lord have your way in me
